itunes:title: Episode 1057 - 50 Immigrants Found Dead In Truck
title: Episode 1057 - 50 Immigrants Found Dead In Truck
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Journalist Brian Entin of News Nation joins the show to talk about the immigrants found dead in a truck near San Antonio, the January 6th hearings, the coverage of the war in Ukraine and the fawning coverage of Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelensky, and...
itunes:summary:
Journalist Brian Entin of News Nation joins the show to talk about the immigrants found dead in a truck near San Antonio, the January 6th hearings, the coverage of the war in Ukraine and the fawning coverage of Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelensky, and why News Nation is dedicating itself to be a cable news network that is truly down the middle.
